Meet Aren

Meet Aren! A professional theatre actor and musician currently based in Regina, he will soon be taking off for work playing the role of "Aaron" as part of Jill Daum's premier of "Forget About Tomorrow" at the Belfry Theatre in Victoria, B.C. – a co-production with the Arts Club in Vancouver, B.C.

One of his favourite works is Holst's "The Planets" and one of his favourite memories is when we performed "A Night of Brahms" in February with the Regina Symphony Orchestra!

Image courtesy of Andrea Norberg Photography
